summary.department: Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science
responsibilities: Teaching software engineering courses at the senior undergraduate and graduate levels
Developing an outstanding research program at the intersection of Software Engineering and AI
summary.collaboration: Evidence of collaboration considered an asset

eligibility.degree: Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or equivalent field
eligibility.completion: Within a year of completion or completed

publication_details.criteria: Demonstrated record of research accomplishment, including publications in top international conference venues (ICSE, FSE, ASE, ICSME, ESEM) or in top journals (TOSEM, TSE, EMSE, JSS)

program_highlights: Teaching at the undergraduate level (1st and 2nd year)
Engagement with topics around Generative AI
candidate_requirements: Professionalism in a collegial academic environment
topics_of_interest: Development of generative AI infused applications
